Edit User

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PgUserService } from 'src/app/services/pg-user/pg-user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-pg-user', templateUrl: './pg-user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./pg-user.component.css'] }) export class PgUserComponent implements OnInit { pgUsers: any[] = []; newUser: any = {}; // Initialize with appropriate structure editUser: any = null; // Store the user being edited constructor(private pgUserService: PgUserService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadPGUsers(); } loadPGUsers(): void { this.pgUserService.getPGUsers().subscribe(data => { this.pgUsers = data; }); } createPGUser(): void { this.pgUserService.createPGUser(this.newUser).subscribe(() => { this.loadPGUsers(); // Refresh the list after creating this.newUser = {}; // Reset form }); } editPGUser(user: any): void { this.editUser = { ...user }; // Clone user data for editing } updatePGUser(): void { if (this.editUser) { this.pgUserService.updatePGUser(this.editUser.id, this.editUser).subscribe(() => { this.loadPGUsers(); // Refresh the list after updating this.editUser = null; // Clear editing form }); } } deletePGUser(id: number): void { this.pgUserService.deletePGUser(id).subscribe(() => { this.loadPGUsers(); // Refresh the list after deleting }); } }
